page.title: 10CLERMISTON AND DRUMBRAE GALA
page.content:
On a Saturday in June every year a gala day is held in Drumbrae Park. A Primary school-girl is chosen to be queen for the day and she dresses up for the part, along with her attendants. There are all sorts of side shows and races. There is a five-a-side football game and our school, Clermiston, were runners-up in the final. The game lasted five minutes in each half and we played against East Craigs Primary. We got a medal for coming second.
{SPORTS DAY AT CLERMISTON SCHOOL On Wednesday 29th May we had our Sports Day. Every class had three events and ours were the flat, sack and three-legged races. Some of the younger children did an egg-and-spoon race instead of the three-legged one in case they fell.
